verses.verse: And Moses<WH4872> called<WH7121> unto all Israel<WH3478>, and said<WH559> unto them<WH8085>, Hear, O Israel<WH3478>, the statutes<WH2706> and the ordinances<WH4941> which I speak<WH1696> in your ears<WH241> this day<WH3117>, that ye may learn<WH3925> them<WH8104>, and observe to do them<WH6213>.
Jehovah <WH3068> our God<WH430> made<WH3772> a covenant<WH1285> with us in Horeb<WH2722>.
Jehovah <WH3068> made<WH3772> not this covenant<WH1285> with our fathers<WH1>, but with us<WH587>, even us<WH587>, who are all of us here alive<WH2416> this day<WH3117>.
Jehovah <WH3068> spake<WH1696> with you face<WH6440> to face<WH6440> in the mount<WH2022> out of the midst<WH8432> of the fire<WH784>,

(I stood<WH5975> between Jehovah<WH3068> and you at that time<WH6256>, to show<WH5046> you the word<WH1697> of Jehovah<WH3068>: for ye were afraid<WH3372> because<WH6440> of the fire<WH784>, and went not up<WH5927> into the mount<WH2022>;) saying<WH559>,
I am Jehovah<WH3068> thy God<WH430>, who brought thee out<WH3318> of the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714>, out of the house<WH1004> of bondage<WH5650>.
Thou shalt have no other<WH312> gods<WH430> before me<WH6440>.

Thou shalt not make<WH6213> unto thee a graven image<WH6459>, nor any likeness<WH8544> of anything that is in heaven<WH8064> above<WH4605>, or that is in the earth<WH776> beneath<WH4325>, or that is in the water under the earth<WH776>:

thou shalt not bow down<WH7812> thyself unto them<WH5647>, nor serve them<WH3068>; for I, Jehovah, thy God<WH430>, am a jealous<WH7067> God<WH430>, visiting<WH6485> the iniquity<WH5771> of the fathers<WH1> upon the children<WH1121>, and upon the third<WH8029> and upon the fourth<WH7256> generation of them that hate me<WH8130>;
and showing<WH6213> lovingkindness<WH2617> unto thousands<WH505> of them that love<WH157> me and keep<WH8104> my commandments<WH4687>.

Thou shalt not take<WH5375> the name<WH8034> of Jehovah<WH3068> thy God<WH430> in vain<WH7723>: for Jehovah<WH3068> will not hold him guiltless<WH5352> that taketh<WH5375> his name<WH8034> in vain<WH7723>.
Observe <WH8104> the sabbath<WH7676> day<WH3117>, to keep<WH8104> it holy<WH3068>, as Jehovah thy God<WH430> commanded thee<WH6680>.
Six <WH8337> days<WH3117> shalt thou labor<WH5647>, and do<WH6213> all thy work<WH4399>;

but the seventh<WH7637> day<WH3117> is a sabbath<WH7676> unto Jehovah<WH3068> thy God<WH430>: in it thou shalt not do<WH6213> any work<WH4399>, thou<WH1121>, nor thy son, nor thy daughter<WH1323>, nor thy man-servant<WH5650>, nor thy maid-servant<WH519>, nor thine ox<WH7794>, nor thine ass<WH2543>, nor any of thy cattle<WH929>, nor thy stranger<WH1616> that is within thy gates<WH8179>; that thy man-servant<WH5650> and thy maid-servant<WH519> may rest as well as thou<WH5117>.

And thou shalt remember<WH2142> that thou wast a servant<WH5650> in the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714>, and Jehovah<WH3068> thy God<WH430> brought<WH3318> thee out thence by a mighty<WH2389> hand<WH3027> and by an outstretched<WH5186> arm<WH2220>: therefore Jehovah<WH3068> thy God<WH430> commanded<WH6680> thee to keep<WH6213> the sabbath<WH7676> day<WH3117>.

Honor <WH3513> thy father<WH1> and thy mother<WH517>, as Jehovah<WH3068> thy God<WH430> commanded<WH6680> thee<WH3117>; that thy days may be long<WH748>, and that it may go well<WH3190> with thee<WH127>, in the land which Jehovah<WH3068> thy God<WH430> giveth thee<WH5414>.
Thou shalt not kill<WH7523>.
Neither shalt thou commit adultery<WH5003>.
Neither shalt thou steal<WH1589>.
Neither shalt thou bear<WH6030> false<WH7723> witness<WH5707> against thy neighbor<WH7453>.

Neither shalt thou covet<WH2530> thy neighbor<WH7453>'s wife<WH802>; neither shalt thou desire<WH183> thy neighbor<WH7453>'s house<WH1004>, his field<WH7704>, or his man-servant<WH5650>, or his maid-servant<WH519>, his ox<WH7794>, or his ass<WH2543>, or anything that is thy neighbor<WH7453>'s.

These words<WH1697> Jehovah<WH3068> spake<WH1696> unto all your assembly<WH6951> in the mount<WH2022> out of the midst<WH8432> of the fire<WH784>, of the cloud<WH6051>, and of the thick darkness<WH6205>, with a great<WH1419> voice<WH6963>: and he added no more<WH3254>. And he wrote<WH3789> them upon two<WH8147> tables<WH3871> of stone<WH68>, and gave them unto me<WH5414>.

And it came to pass<WH8085>, when ye heard the voice<WH6963> out of the midst<WH8432> of the darkness<WH2822>, while the mountain<WH2022> was burning<WH1197> with fire<WH784>, that ye came near<WH7126> unto me<WH7218>, even all the heads of your tribes<WH7626>, and your elders<WH2205>;

and ye said<WH559>, Behold<WH3068>, Jehovah our God<WH430> hath showed<WH7200> us his glory<WH3519> and his greatness<WH1433>, and we have heard<WH8085> his voice<WH6963> out of the midst<WH8432> of the fire<WH784>: we have seen<WH7200> this day<WH3117> that God<WH430> doth speak<WH1696> with man<WH120>, and he liveth<WH2425>.

Now therefore why should we die<WH4191>? for this great<WH1419> fire<WH784> will consume<WH398> us<WH8085>: if we hear the voice<WH6963> of Jehovah<WH3068> our God<WH430> any more<WH3254>, then we shall die<WH4191>.

For who is there of all flesh<WH1320>, that hath heard<WH8085> the voice<WH6963> of the living<WH2416> God<WH430> speaking<WH1696> out of the midst<WH8432> of the fire<WH784>, as we have<WH2421>, and lived?

Go thou near<WH7126>, and hear<WH8085> all that Jehovah<WH3068> our God<WH430> shall say<WH559>: and speak<WH559> thou unto us all that Jehovah<WH3068> our God<WH430> shall speak<WH1696> unto thee<WH8085>; and we will hear it<WH6213>, and do it.

And Jehovah<WH3068> heard<WH8085> the voice<WH6963> of your words<WH1697>, when ye spake<WH1696> unto me<WH3068>; and Jehovah said<WH1696> unto me<WH8085>, I have heard the voice<WH6963> of the words<WH1697> of this people<WH5971>, which they have spoken<WH1696> unto thee<WH3190>: they have well said all that they have spoken<WH1696>.

Oh that there were such<WH2088> a<WH4310> heart<WH3824> in them<WH5414>, that they would fear<WH3372> me<WH8104>, and keep all my commandments<WH4687> always<WH3117>, that it might be well<WH3190> with them<WH1121>, and with their children for ever<WH5769>!
Go <WH3212> say<WH559> to them<WH7725>, Return ye to your tents<WH168>.

But as for thee<WH5975>, stand thou here by me<WH5978>, and I will speak<WH1696> unto thee all the commandment<WH4687>, and the statutes<WH2706>, and the ordinances<WH4941>, which thou shalt teach<WH3925> them<WH6213>, that they may do them in the land<WH776> which I give<WH5414> them to possess it<WH3423>.
Ye shall observe<WH8104> to do<WH6213> therefore as Jehovah<WH3068> your God<WH430> hath commanded<WH6680> you<WH5493>: ye shall not turn aside to the right hand<WH3225> or to the left<WH8040>.

Ye shall walk<WH3212> in all the way<WH1870> which Jehovah<WH3068> your God<WH430> hath commanded<WH6680> you<WH2421>, that ye may live, and that it may be well<WH2895> with you<WH748>, and that ye may prolong your days<WH3117> in the land<WH776> which ye shall possess<WH3423>.
